text: George H. Hodges was an American Democratic Party politician who served as governor of Kansas from 1913 to 1915. During his time as governor legislation was obtained for the upgrading of state hospitals and penal institutions, judicial and tax reforms, stronger business regulation, and better schools.Kansas governors by Homer E. Socolofsky, 1990, P.143 ==References== Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Governors of Kansas
title: George H. Hodges
